system.description:
On Resound 3+, you may sing that song of life and death, culminating in a breaking verse.

Spend 2 Beats to choose a single fighter in the battlefield that can hear you. Until the end of violence, they cannot make attacks or any other hostile action. Chiefs and Braves lose -1 Riff.
system.flavor: You sing a siday, the folk epic songs of your people. Your song bolsters those around you, and entrances your enemies. They are thrown into a reverie state, forced to play out the Siday that you sing, wherein you are the inevitable victor. However, it is a well-known fact that Siday last for up to seven days and seven nights, enumerating the exploits of great datu and dayang.
